Publish.LongDescription:
## Custom decal asset to customize subway stations
## PLEASE PLACE ALL ASSETS USING ANARCHY, OTHERWISE THEY WILL DISAPPEAR.
# How to use it 1. Place the Metro Sao Paulo Base Station Sign Decal in a station, wall, billboard.. using Anarchy. 2. Add the station name decal on top of the Station Sign. There are names in english and brazilian portuguese. 3. Add relevant icons for the lines available in that station. For custom stations with multiple entrances, I recomend the Modular Subway Station Assets Pack. 4. For the subway map, place a Screen asset and after that place the Metro Sao Paulo Screen Poster on top of it.
#### All of the lines names, colors and icons are based in the Sao Paulo Metro in Brazil.
